title: LF Team, casual, serious, all of the above?
body:
Hey guys, so I'm currently S2 in SOLO Queue, which I don't play very often because well, who likes playing alone? 
I have a microphone and Skype, TS3, Vent, Curse more then happy to use VoiP but I am looking for a team I can play with regularly, weather its just for fun, to push rating or what ever reason. I currently main mid-lane but I'm learning support at the moment., can also play ADC and occasional top, just don't put me in the jungle :P

In-game name is Jazz McGaw . Looking forward to hearing from you :)

replies.body: Hi there, i am currently looking to make a ranked team and was wondering if you would be interested, i have sent you a friend request on league and would love to hear back from you.
